title: The Spiciest Spaghetti EVER...(ft. Whole bottle of 'Da Bomb')
author: Matt Stonie
description:
Come to explore Inazuma with me in Genshin Impact today: https://mhy.link/7092ICA6
Let me know how you like Raiden Shogun and Kujou Sara. Leave a comment down below.
Thanks to Genshin Impact for sponsoring today’s episode!

After seeing 'Da Bomb' hot sauce on Hot Ones for years now, I've always wanted to give it a try and see how I could handle the heat.
Unfortunately, this gave me the idea to use a WHOLE BOTTLE on a single dish, which, was a horrible idea...

ENJOY!!!
